goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
indicator_definition: In order that decision-making be responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative, it is important to ensure diversity in representation at all levels of State institutions (central, regional and local).
target: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
title: Untitled
computation_calculations: Number of female judges out of the total number of judges  *100
source_data_supplier_1:
1.Agency for Court Administration
2.Ministry of Justice
3.Superior Council of Magistracy
comparison_global: The indicator is complementary to the global one

ro.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
ro.indicator_definition: In order that decision-making be responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative, it is important to ensure diversity in representation at all levels of State institutions (central, regional and local).
ro.title: Untitled
ro.target: Asigurarea procesului decizional receptiv, incluziv, participativ și reprezentativ la toate nivelurile
ro.computation_calculations: Numărul femeilor judecători  raportat la numărul total al judecătorilor *100
ro.source_data_supplier_1:
1) Agenția de Administrare a Instanțelor Judecătorești, Ministerul Justiției.
2) Consiliul Superior al Magistraturii
ro.comparison_global: Indicatorul este unul complementar celui global
